name: CreateUserNotificationSubscriptions
description:
Create new notification subscriptions for a user.

This tool is used to create new notification subscriptions for a specified user on PagerDuty. It requires scoped OAuth with the `subscribers.write` permission.

parameters.name: resource_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the resource for which to create notification subscriptions.

parameters.name: accept_header_version
parameters.description: Specify the version of the API to use for creating user notification subscriptions.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

parameters.name: entities_to_subscribe
parameters.description: A JSON array of entities to subscribe to. Each entity must include 'subscribable_id' (ID of entity) and 'subscribable_type' ('incident' or 'business_service').

subscribable_id.description: The ID of the entity to subscribe to

subscribable_type.description: The type of the entity being subscribed to

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Pagerduty API.

parameters.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

subscribable_type.description: The type of the entity being subscribed to
